//
// Bhumik Shah
//    IIIT Hyderabad
//
#include <bits/stdc++.h>

#define mod 1000000007
#define f(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
#define ll long long
#define clr(a) memset(a,0,sizeof(a))
#define out(n) cout<<n<<"\n";
#define in(n) cin>>n;

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int test=0;
	scanf("%d",&test);
	while(test>0)
	{
		int wt=0,init_wt=0,i=0,j=0,final_wt=0,num=0;
		vector<pair<int,int> > main_arr;
		long long int dp[10000];
		memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
		dp[0]=0;
		scanf("%d%d",&init_wt,&final_wt);
		scanf("%d",&num);
		final_wt=final_wt-init_wt;
		pair<int,int> p;
		for(i=0;i<num;i++)
		{
			scanf("%d%d",&p.first,&p.second);
			main_arr.push_back(p);
		}
		for(wt=1;wt<=final_wt;wt++)
		{
			for(j=0;j<main_arr.size();j++)
			{
				if((wt-main_arr[j].second)>=0)
				{
					if(dp[wt]==-1 && dp[wt-main_arr[j].second]!=-1)
					{
						dp[wt]=dp[wt-main_arr[j].second]+main_arr[j].first;
					}
					else if(dp[wt]>(dp[wt-main_arr[j].second]+main_arr[j].first) && dp[wt-main_arr[j].second]!=-1)
					{
						dp[wt]=dp[wt-main_arr[j].second]+main_arr[j].first;
					}
				}
			}
		}
		/*for(i=0;i<=final_wt;i++)
		{
			printf("%lld ",dp[i]);
		}
		printf("\n");*/
		if(dp[final_wt]==-1)
		{
			printf("This is impossible.\n");
		}
		else
		{
			printf("The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is %lld.\n",dp[final_wt]);
		}
		test--;
	}
	return 0;
}
